Packagecom.yahoo.astra.fl.charts.series
Classpublic class LineSeries
InheritanceLineSeries CartesianSeries Series fl.core.UIComponent

Renders data points as a series of connected line segments.

connectDiscontinuousPoints
Type: Boolean
If true, draws a dashed line between discontinuous points. The default value is false.		LineSeries
  
connectPoints
Type: Boolean
If true, lines are drawn between the markers. If false, only the markers are drawn. The default value is true.		LineSeries
  
discontinuousDashLength
Type: Number
The length of dashes in a discontinuous line. The default value is 10.		LineSeries

Type: Number

lineWeight
Type: Number
The weight, in pixels, of the line drawn between points in this series. The default value is 3.		LineSeries

Type: Number
The alpha value from 0.0 to 1.0 to use for drawing the markers.		Series
 
markerSize
Type: Number
The size, in pixels, of each marker.		Series

Type: Class
The Class used to instantiate each marker's skin.		Series
  
showAreaFill
Type: Boolean
If true, the series will include a fill under the line, extending to the axis. The default value is false.		LineSeries
